sentences.sContent: My sister Margot was born in Frankfurt am Main in Germany in 1926.
sentences.sCn: 我姐姐玛戈特1926年出生在德国美因河畔的法兰克福。

sentences.sContent: At the end of the year we were both in tears as we said a heartbreaking farewell, because I'd been accepted at the Jewish Lyceum, where Margot also went to school.
sentences.sCn: 六年级结束的时候，我和科普卢斯夫人都流下了离别的眼泪，因为我被犹太公立中学录取了，而玛戈特也在那里读中学。
